main_definition: A material made of interlacing fibers, typically used to make fabrics or other items.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to the woven materials like fabric or cloth
meanings_and_examples.example: The textile industry produces various types of clothing and home furnishings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who works with fibers, weaving them into fabrics
meanings_and_examples.example: She has a career as a textile designer creating unique patterns for fashion brands.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The trade or business of manufacturing and selling fabric materials
meanings_and_examples.example: He started his own small textile business, specializing in organic cotton fabrics.
